channel.title: Box Elder County|Utah|United States on Roadsign Pictures
channel.description: Recent content in Box Elder County|Utah|United States on Roadsign Pictures

item.title: I-84 West - Exit 32
item.description: I-84 west at Exit 32 - Whites Valley Road. This interchange was renamed in 2021 from Ranch Exit.

item.title: I-84 West - Exit 32
item.description: I-84 west approaching Exit 32 - Whites Valley Road. This interchange was renamed in 2021 from Ranch Exit.

item.title: End US-91 South at I-15/I-84
item.description: US-91 south at I-15 North/Pocatello (Idaho)/I-84 West/Twin Falls (Idaho). Use I-15 South/I-84 East for Ogden. US-91 south ends here.

item.title: US-91 South - To I-15/I-84
item.description: US-91 South - To I-15/I-84 in Brigham City. US-91 is posted as US-91 west, which is the current direction of the roadway, although the route itself is a north-south route.

item.title: US-89/US-91 South at BL-15/UT-13/US-89 South
item.description: US-89/US-91 South at BL-15/UT-13/US-89 South (Main St.) in Brigham City. Turn left to continue south on US-89. Turn right for UT-13/(BL-15) North. US-89 separates from US-91 southbound.

item.title: US-89/US-91 South Approaching BL-15/UT-13
item.description: US-89/US-91 South Approaching BL-15/UT-13 (Main St.) in Brigham City. Continue on US-91 South for Salt Lake/Tremonton/Ogden.

item.title: US-89/US-91 South at UT-90 Exit
item.description: US-89/US-91 South at UT-90/Brigham City exit.

item.title: US-89/US-91 South Approaching UT-90
item.description: US-89/US-91 South approaching UT-90/Brigham City.

item.title: US-89/US-91 South - Box Elder County
item.description: Entering Box Elder County on US-89/US-91 South.

item.title: UT-126 South at I-15 and I-84
item.description: UT-126 South at I-15 and I-84 (Exit 351). Turn right for I-84 West/I-15 North.

item.title: US-89 North at UT-126 South
item.description: US-89 North at UT-126 South to I-15 and I-84 Junction.

item.title: US-89 North - Box Elder County
item.description: Entering Box Elder County on US-89 North.

item.title: I-15 South - Exit 351
item.description: I-15 south approaching Exit 351 - UT-126/To US-89/Willard/Pleasant View

item.title: I-15 South/I-84 East - Exit 365
item.description: I-15 South/I-84 East at Exit 365 - UT-13/900 North St.

item.title: I-15 South at I-84 - Tremonton
item.description: I-15 South at I-84 in Tremonton. Use Exit 379 for I-84 West/Tremonton/Boise (Idaho). I-84 east joins I-15 southbound. Use I-15 South/I-84 East for Ogden and Salt Lake. The winter sun is glowing through the fog.

item.title: I-15 South - Exit 379
item.description: I-15 south approaching Exit 379 - I-84 West/Tremonton/Boise (Idaho). I-84 east joins I-15 southbound to Ogden.

item.title: I-15 South - Exit 381
item.description: I-15 south approaching Exit 381 - BL-15/Tremonton/Garland.

item.title: I-15 South - Exit 385
item.description: I-15 south approaching Exit 385 - UT-30 East/Riverside/Logan. This sign appears to be attached to an older, smaller sign.

item.title: I-15 South - Exit 392
item.description: I-15 south approaching Exit 392 - UT-13 South/Plymouth.

item.title: I-15 South - Distance Marker
item.description: Distance marker on I-15 south. Distance to Tremonton, Ogden, and Salt Lake City. This is the first distance marker southbound on I-15 in Utah.

item.title: I-15 South - Exit 398
item.description: I-15 south approaching Exit 398 - Portage. This is the first exit southbound on I-15 in Utah.

item.title: I-15 South - Welcome To Utah
item.description: Welcome to Utah - Life Elevated on I-15 south. Taken at the Idaho-Utah state line.

item.title: End UT-30 at I-84 West
item.description: End UT-30 at I-84 West. Use I-84 west for Boise (Idaho). Continue east on county road to Snowville.

item.title: End UT-30 East at I-84
item.description: End UT-30 East at I-84 (Exit 5) in Box Elder County.

item.title: UT-30 East at I-84
item.description: UT-30 east at I-84 (Exit 5). Use I-84 west for Boise (Idaho); I-84 east for Salt Lake. Continue east on county road for Snowville. UT-30 ends here at I-84.

item.title: UT-30 East Approaching I-84
item.description: UT-30 East approaching I-84 (Exit 5).

item.title: UT-30 East - Black Pine Road
item.description: UT-30 east at Black Pine Road jct. Turn north for Juniper, Sublette, and Black Pine.

item.title: End UT-42 South at UT-30
item.description: End UT-42 South at UT-30 in Box Elder County.

item.title: UT-42 South at UT-30
item.description: UT-42 South at UT-30 in Box Elder County. Use UT-30 west for Park Valley, Grouse Creek, and Elko (Nevada). Continue east on UT-30 for Snowville. UT-42 ends here.

item.title: UT-42 South Approaching UT-30
item.description: UT-42 South approaching UT-30 in Box Elder County.

item.title: UT-42 South - Distance Marker
item.description: Distance marker on UT-42 south. Distance to Snowville and Tremonton.

item.title: UT-42 South - Welcome To Utah
item.description: Welcome to Utah / Box Elder County at the Utah - Idaho state line on UT-42 south.

item.title: UT-13 North at 4600 West
item.description: UT-13 north at 4600 West. Turn right on 4600 West to I-15 and I-84.

item.title: UT-13 North at I-15 South/I-84 East
item.description: UT-13 North at I-15 South/I-84 East (Exit 365) to Salt Lake City and Ogden.

item.title: UT-13 North at I-15/I-84
item.description: UT-13 North/BL-15 North/BL-84 West at I-15/I-84 (Exit 365). Use I-15 North/I-84 West to Tremonton; I-15 South/I-84 East to Ogden and Salt Lake City.

item.title: UT-13 North Approaching I-15/I-84
item.description: UT-13 North/BL-15 North/BL-84 West approaching I-15/I-84.

item.title: UT-13 North/BL-15 North/BL-84 West - Distance Marker
item.description: Distance Marker on UT-13 North/BL-15 North/BL-84 West. Distance to Tremonton and Corrine.

item.title: UT-13 North - Brigham City
item.description: UT-13 North/BL-15 North/BL-84 West in Brigham City

item.title: UT-13 North at UT-38
item.description: UT-13 North/BL-15 North/BL-15 West at UT-38 in Brigham City.

item.title: UT-13 North Approaching UT-38
item.description: UT-13 North/BL-15 North/BL-84 West approaching UT-38 in Brigham City. Use UT-38 north for Honeyville; use UT-13 North/BL-15 North/BL-84 West for Corrine and Tremonton.

item.title: BL-15/BL-84/UT-15 North Approaching UT-38
item.description: BL-15/BL-84/UT-15 North (Main St.) approaching UT-38 in Brigham City. Merge left to continue north on UT-13 and for I-84 and I-15.

item.title: BL-15/BL-84/UT-13 North at UT-90
item.description: BL-15 North/BL-84 West/UT-13 North (S Main St.) at UT-90 (E 200 S)

item.title: BL-15/BL-84/UT-13 North - Brigham City
item.description: BL-15 North/BL-84 West/UT-13 North (S. Main St.) in Brigham City.

item.title: US-91 North at US-89/UT-13
item.description: US-91 north at US-89/UT-13. Use US-89 south for Perry. US-89 joins US-91 north to Logan.

item.title: US-91 North Approaching US-89/UT-13
item.description: US-91 north (1100 S) approaching US-89 and UT-13 (Main St).

item.title: I-15 North/I-84 West - Exit 362
item.description: I-15 North/I-84 West at Exit 362 - US-91/To US-89/1100 South St.

item.title: End UT-83 North at I-84 West
item.description: End UT-83 North at I-84 West to Snowville.

item.title: UT-83 North At I-84 (Exit 26)
item.description: End UT-83 north at I-84. Use I-84 east to Tremonton; use I-84 west to Snowville.

item.title: UT-83 North at I-84 (Exit 26)
item.description: End UT-83 north at I-84.

item.title: UT-83 North at Faust Valley Road
item.description: UT-83 North at Faust Valley Road. Turn left to continue north on UT-83 towards Howell.

item.title: UT-83 North to I-84 - Box Elder County
item.description: UT-83 North at Faust Valley Road. Turn left to continue north on UT-83 to I-84.

item.title: UT-83 North - Distance Marker
item.description: Distance marker on UT-83 north. Distance to ATK and Missile Display (both related to Northrup Grumman).

item.title: UT-83 North - Box Elder County
item.description: UT-83 North in Box Elder County

item.title: UT-83 North at Promontory Road
item.description: UT-83 North at Promontory Road to Promontory and Golden Spike National Historic Site.

item.title: UT-83 North Approaching Promontory Road
item.description: UT-83 North approaching Promontory Road to Promontory and Golden Spike National Historic Park.

item.title: UT-83 North Approaching UT-102
item.description: UT-83 North approaching UT-102 in Box Elder County.

item.title: UT-83 North at N 6800 W and Iowa String Road
item.description: UT-83 North at N 6800 W and Iowa String Road

item.title: UT-83 North Approaching Iowa String Road and N 6800 W
item.description: UT-83 North approaching Iowa String Road and N 6800 W. Use Iowa String Road to Bear River and Tremonton; use N 6800 W to West Corrine.

item.title: UT-13 North at UT-83
item.description: UT-13 north at UT-83. Turn right to continue north on UT-13 to Bear River and Tremonton.

item.title: US-89 South at UT-126
item.description: US-89 South at UT-126/To I-84/To I-15/Salt Lake. Merge right to continue south on US-89 for Ogden.

item.title: US-89 South Approaching UT-126
item.description: US-89 South approaching UT-126.

item.title: US-89 South at UT-315
item.description: US-89 South at UT-315/To I-15/To I-84 in Willard.

item.description: US-89 South approaching UT-315 in Willard.

item.title: US-89 South Approaching UT-315
item.description: US-89 South approaching UT-315/To I-84/To-15.

item.title: US-89 South - Brigham City
item.description: US-89 south in Brigham City.

item.title: End UT-13 South at US-89/US-91
item.description: End UT-13 South at US-89/US-91. Use US-91 South/US-89 North for access to I-15 and I-84.

item.title: End UT-13 South Approaching US-89/US-91
item.description: End UT-13 South approaching US-89/US-91 in Brigham city.

item.title: UT-13 South - Distance Marker
item.description: Distance marker on UT-13 south. Distance to Perry, Ogden, and Salt Lake City.

item.title: UT-13 South at UT-90
item.description: UT-13 South at UT-90 east to Logan. Continue south on UT-13 for Salt Lake City.

item.title: UT-13 South - Brigham City
item.description: UT-13 South in Brigham City

item.title: UT-38 South at UT-240 in Honeyville
item.description: UT-38 South at UT-240 in Honeyville. Turn right for UT-240 West and for I-15 access.

item.title: End UT-102 East at UT-38
item.description: End UT-102 East at UT-38 in Deweyvile. Turn right for UT-38 south to Brigham City and Honeyville; left for UT-38 north to Logan.

item.title: UT-102 East - Distance Marker
item.description: Distance marker on UT-102 East. Distance to Deweyville, and Logan.

item.title: UT-102 East - Tremonton
item.description: UT-102 East in Tremonton

item.title: UT-102 East Approaching UT-13
item.description: UT-102 East approaching UT-13 in Tremonton.

item.title: UT-102 East Approaching UT-13
item.description: UT-102 East approaching UT-13 in Tremonton. Use UT-13 South for Elwood; UT-13 North for Plymouth; UT-102 East for Deweyville.

item.title: UT-102 West Approaching I-84
item.description: UT-102 West approaching I-84 (Exit 40) in Tremonton.

item.title: I-15 South/I-84 East - Tremonton
item.description: I-15 South/I-84 East in Tremonton. These types of signs are common along I-15/I-84 between Tremonton and Ogden.

item.title: I-84 West - Distance Marker
item.description: Distance marker on I-84 west. Distance to Snowville, Twin Falls (ID), and Boise(ID).

item.title: I-84 Onramp at Blue Creek IC
item.description: I-84 Onramp at Blue Creek IC in Box Elder County. Use I-84 west to Snowville; I-84 east to Tremonton.

item.title: Blue Creek Frontage Road at I-84
item.description: Blue Creek Frontage Road at I-84 (Exit 20) in Box Elder County.

item.title: I-84 West - Exit 40
item.description: I-84 west at Exit 40 - UT-102/Tremonton/Bothwell.

item.title: I-15 North/I-84 West - Willard
item.description: I-15 North/I-84 West in Willard.

item.title: UT-13 North at I-15 North/I-84 West - Exit 376
item.description: UT-13 North at I-15 North/I-84 West (Exit 376) onramp. Interstate shields with the UTAH text are becoming more common in Utah. It appears that all new interstate shields contain the UTAH text - at least in the Salt Lake area.

item.title: UT-30 West - Distance Marker
item.description: Distance marker on UT-30 west. Distance to Montello, and Elko. Both of those places are in Nevada.

item.title: UT-30 West - Lucin and Grouse Creek Jct.
item.description: UT-30 west at Grouse Creek Road. Turn right for Grouse Creek, left for Lucin and T Bar Ranch. Continue west on UT-30 for Montello (Nevada).

item.title: UT-30 West - Lynn Jct.
item.description: UT-30 west at junction to Lynn and Roden Valley Ranch. Continue west on UT-30 for Grouse Creek.

item.title: UT-30 West - Ranch Jct.
item.description: UT-30 west at junction to Montgomery Ranch and Palmer Ranch.

item.title: UT-30 West - Rosette
item.description: Entering Rosette on UT-30 west. Rosette has a post office but not much else.

item.title: UT-30 West - Park Valley
item.description: Entering Park Valley on UT-30 west. Park Valley is a tiny community with not much more than a school and post office.

item.title: UT-30 West - Kelton Jct.
item.description: UT-30 west at turnoff to Kelton. Kelton is a ghost town that at one time was the rail head for all Idaho bound stage coaches.

item.title: UT-30 West at UT-42
item.description: UT-30 West at UT-42 in rural Box Elder County.

item.title: UT-30 West Approaching UT-42
item.description: UT-30 west approaching UT-42. Use UT-42 for Boise (Idaho). Continue west (turn left) on UT-30 for Park Valley, Grouse Creek, and Elko (Nevada). Boise is an interesting destination city to put on this sign since Boise is on the entire other side of the state from where UT-42 crosses into Idaho. Malta, or even Burley would be more appropriate.

item.title: UT-30 West - Distance Marker
item.description: Distance marker on UT-30 west. Distance to Strevell, and Burley. Both of these communities are in Idaho, and both are accessed via UT-42.

item.title: UT-30 West - Black Pine Road
item.description: UT-30 west at Black Pine Road jct. to Black Pine, Sublett, and Juniper. All three of those destinations are tiny communities within Idaho.

item.title: UT-30 East - Next Services 102 Miles
item.description: UT-30 west - Next Services 102 Miles. The next town with services is Montello, Nevada.

item.title: I-84 East at UT-30 - Exit 5
item.description: I-84 east at UT-30 junction. Turn left on UT-30 west for Strevell (Idaho), Park Valley, and Elko (Nevada).

item.title: Begin UT-240 East at I-15 North
item.description: Begin UT-240 at I-15 north. Turn left for I-15 north to Tremonton; use UT-240 east to Honeyville.

item.title: W 6900 North at I-15/I-84
item.description: W 6900 North at I-15/I-84 in Honeyville.

item.title: W 6900 North at I-15/I-84 (Exit 372)
item.description: W 6900 North at I-15/I-84 (Exit 372) in Honeyville. Turn right for I-15 South/I-84 East to Brigham City. Continue over freeway for I-15 North/I-84 West to Tremonton and Honeyville (via UT-240).

item.title: UT-13 North at 4600 West
item.description: UT-13 north at 4600 West. Turn right on 4600 West to I-15 and I-84.

item.title: UT-13 North at UT-83
item.description: UT-13 north at UT-83 in Corrine. Continue straight for UT-83; turn right for UT-13 north.

item.title: UT-13 North at UT-83
item.description: UT-13 north at UT-83. Turn right to continue north on UT-13 to Bear River and Tremonton.

item.title: UT-13 North Approaching UT-83
item.description: UT-13 North approaching UT-83 in Corrine.

item.title: UT-13 North - Distance Marker
item.description: Distance marker on UT-13 north. Distance to Corrine, and ATK (an aerospace company).

item.title: I-15 North at UT-13 - Exit 368 Offramp
item.description: I-15 North at UT-13 (Exit 368 offramp) in Brigham City.

item.title: I-15 North at UT-13 - Exit 368 Offramp
item.description: I-15 North Exit 368 offramp at UT-13. Turn left for Brigham City; turn right for Corrine and Golden Spike National Historic Site.

item.title: UT-30 East at I-84
item.description: UT-30 east at I-84 (Exit 5). Use I-84 west for Boise (Idaho); I-84 east for Salt Lake. Continue east on county road for Snowville. UT-30 ends here at I-84.

item.title: UT-30 West - Box Elder County
item.description: UT-30 west in Box Elder County.

item.description: I-84 west at Exit 40 - UT-102/Tremonton/Bothwell.

item.description: I-15 North/I-84 West at Exit 362 - US-91/To US-89/1100 South St.

item.title: I-15 North - Exit 379
item.description: I-15 North/I-84 West approaching Exit 379 - I-84 West/Boise (Idaho). Continue north on I-15 towards Pocatello (Idaho). This is the northern end of the I-84/I-15 multiplex.

item.title: I-84 East - Speed Limit 75/Minimum Speed 45
item.description: Speed Limit 75/Minimum Speed 45 on I-84 east. Minimum speeds are not posted with every speed sign on Utah freeways, but are placed sporadically. A typical speed limit installation just contains the maximum speed.

item.title: I-84 East - East 26
item.description: I-84 east at Exit 26 - UT-83 South/Howell.

item.title: I-84 East - Exit 24
item.description: I-84 east approaching Exit 24 - Pocatello Valley. This interchange has recently been renamed from Valley.

item.title: I-84 East - Exit 17
item.description: I-84 east approaching Exit 17 - Rattlesnake Pass. This exit was formerly called Ranch Exit.

item.title: End UT-82 South at UT-102
item.description: End UT-82 south at UT-102 in downtown Tremonton.

item.title: UT-13 South at UT-82
item.description: UT-13 south at UT-82. I-15 traffic should continue on UT-13 to avoid the city of Garland.

item.title: UT-13 South Approaching UT-82
item.description: UT-13 south approaching UT-82. Use UT-82 south for Garland and Tremonton. Use UT-13 south for Salt Lake.

item.description: UT-30 west approaching UT-13. Use UT-13 south for Tremonton and Garland. Use UT-13 north for Pocatello (Idaho).

item.description: UT-30 west approaching UT-13. Use UT-13 south for the Golden Spike National Historic Site.
